title: Satisfaction
verses: Psalm 107:9 (WEB) — "For he satisfies the longing soul. He fills the hungry soul with good."
Matthew 5:6 (WEB) — "Blessed are those who hunger and thirst after righteousness, for they shall be filled."

Isaiah 58:11 (WEB) — "Yahweh will guide you continually, satisfy your soul in dry places, and make your bones strong; and you will be like a watered garden, and like a spring of water whose waters don’t fail."
Psalm 17:15 (WEB) — "As for me, I shall see your face in righteousness. I shall be satisfied, when I awake, with seeing your form."
Philippians 4:11 (WEB) — "I have learned, in whatever state I am, to be content in it."
body: True satisfaction is not the achievement of desire but the alignment of desire with God—hungering for righteousness, beholding His face, and learning contentment in every season.
prayer: Satisfy me, O God, with Your steadfast love. Reorder my desires to seek Your righteousness and teach my heart holy contentment. Amen.
